item.title: Jenny add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Any excuse, no matter how valid, only weakens the character." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Jenny add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "This above all: to thine own self be true, And it must follow, as the night the day, Thou canst not then be false to any man." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Books serve to show a man that those original thoughts of his aren't very new after all." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jenny add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jenny add a quote by A.A. Milne
Jenny add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "Seize the moment. Remember all those women on the 'Titanic' who waved off the dessert cart." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Jenny add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "There is no love sincerer than the love of food." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "You can tell a lot about a fellow's character by his way of eating jellybeans. " -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, 'Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous?' Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won't feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do. We were born to make manifest the glory of God that is within us. It's not just in some of us; it's in everyone. And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "You never have to change anything you got up in the middle of the night to write." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Walt Disney Company
item.description: "The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful of all." -- Walt Disney Company

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "If there are no stupid questions, then what kind of questions do stupid people ask? Do they get smart just in time to ask questions?" -- Scott Adams

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein
